Cya in a month, Rick!


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RickEKildahl@a... wrote:
> Hi, NBWrpgers! This is going to be my last post for about a month, 
so please 
> forgive me if I get behind.
> 
>        A blinding flash of light breaks the Australian night. A 
rainbow 
> energy hits a plateau. Something takes form within the swirling 
energy. Beta 
> 1 activates his genetic scanner. The rainbow energy stops. A wolf 
howls as 
> the scanner beam passes over it. Beta 1 mutates, and transforms 
into his new 
> TM2 Wolf form. His eyes are closed, and the mysterious energy 
circles over 
> his head. The energy streaks across space, into the cosmos...
>  "Primus, I have reached the earth..."
